story.book

Class DecisionPickerActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • story.book.DecisionPickerActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestingActivity

    public class DecisionPickerActivity
extends Activity
implements RequestingActivity
    DecisionPickerActivity lets the author select a fragment and a title to create a decision branch for the current story fragment being edited.
    Author:
    Jessica Surya, Vina Nguyen
